Class LadderAndSnake

java.lang.Object
LadderAndSnake
public class LadderAndSnake extends Object
The LadderAndSnake creates an instance of the "Ladder and Snake" board game.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gabriel Horth
See Also:
Player, PlayLadderAndSnake

  • Constructor Details

    • LadderAndSnake

      public LadderAndSnake​(int players)
      Constructor instantiates LadderAndSnake game to default settings. Creates Player[] playerArray Assings default names and character to Players Prints out playerArray unless user will modify Players with setPlayerNamesAndChars()
      Parameters:
      players - number of Players for game.

  • Method Details

    • getSettings

      public static boolean[] getSettings()
      getSettings return previously select game settings.
      Returns:
      setting[] either default or chosen by mainMenu() in PlayLadderAndSnake
      See Also:
      PlayLadderAndSnake

    • setSettings

      public static void setSettings()
      Prompt user to pick default settings for LadderAndSnake game. Setting stay active unless changed. Setting also affect decidePlayerOrder() method.
      See Also:
      applySettingsToGame(), decidePlayerOrder()

    • applySettingsToGame

      public void applySettingsToGame()
      Applies chosen setting to current game session.
      See Also:
      setSettings()

    • fillHashMap

      public void fillHashMap()
      Create hashmap between a Player character and a Players name.
      See Also:
      declareWinner()

    • checkIfGameWon

      public void checkIfGameWon()
      Checks if a player has won current game. sets boolean gameWon to true the game has been won.

    • declareWinner

      public String declareWinner()
      Maps winners Character back to winners name, return String.
      Returns:
      playerName "has won the game!!!!"
      See Also:
      fillHashMap()

    • isWaitBetweenRounds

      public boolean isWaitBetweenRounds()
      Checks if setting to wait for user input between rounds is active.
      Returns:
      boolean

    • setWaitBetweenRounds

      public void setWaitBetweenRounds​(boolean waitBetweenRounds)
      Activates or disactivates setting to wait for user input between rounds.
      Parameters:
      waitBetweenRounds - true or false

    • flipDice

      public static int flipDice()
      Generates a random int between one and six.
      Returns:
      int

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn()
      Plays one round and update current board. Prints board If printOutRoundResults() is true will print out text of each players turn
